resourceInfo.description: Scaffold genome sequence for T. gondii type I RH strain provided on 2006-09-25, by Matt Berriman (The Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute), Jim Ajioka (University of Cambridge). Contact: Matt Berriman mb4@sanger.ac.uk. (Chromosomes Ia and Ib only).
